results.text: In the beginning God created the heaven and the earth.
results.textEnhanced: In the beginning God created the heaven and the earth.

results.text: In the beginning, God created the heavens and the earth.
results.textEnhanced: In the beginning, God created the heavens and the earth.

results.text: Also in the day of your gladness, and in your solemn days, and in the beginnings of your months, ye shall blow with the trumpets over your burnt offerings, and over the sacrifices of your peace offerings; that they may be to you for a memorial before your God: I am the LORD your God.
results.textEnhanced: Also in the day of your gladness, and in your solemn days, and in the beginnings of your months, ye shall blow with the trumpets over your burnt offerings, and over the sacrifices of your peace offerings; that they may be to you for a memorial before your God: I am the LORD your God.

results.text: And in the beginnings of your months ye shall offer a burnt offering unto the LORD; two young bullocks, and one ram, seven lambs of the first year without spot;
results.textEnhanced: And in the beginnings of your months ye shall offer a burnt offering unto the LORD; two young bullocks, and one ram, seven lambs of the first year without spot;

results.text: So Gideon, and the hundred men that were with him, came unto the outside of the camp in the beginning of the middle watch; and they had but newly set the watch: and they blew the trumpets, and brake the pitchers that were in their hands.
results.textEnhanced: So Gideon, and the hundred men that were with him, came unto the outside of the camp in the beginning of the middle watch; and they had but newly set the watch: and they blew the trumpets, and brake the pitchers that were in their hands.

results.text: So Naomi returned, and Ruth the Moabitess, her daughter in law, with her, which returned out of the country of Moab: and they came to Bethlehem in the beginning of barley harvest.
results.textEnhanced: So Naomi returned, and Ruth the Moabitess, her daughter in law, with her, which returned out of the country of Moab: and they came to Bethlehem in the beginning of barley harvest.

results.text: And he delivered them into the hands of the Gibeonites, and they hanged them in the hill before the LORD: and they fell all seven together, and were put to death in the days of harvest, in the first days, in the beginning of barley harvest.
results.textEnhanced: And he delivered them into the hands of the Gibeonites, and they hanged them in the hill before the LORD: and they fell all seven together, and were put to death in the days of harvest, in the first days, in the beginning of barley harvest.

results.text: And in the reign of Ahasuerus, in the beginning of his reign, wrote they unto him an accusation against the inhabitants of Judah and Jerusalem.
results.textEnhanced: And in the reign of Ahasuerus, in the beginning of his reign, wrote they unto him an accusation against the inhabitants of Judah and Jerusalem.

results.text: And in the reign of Ahasuerus, in the beginning of his reign, they wrote an accusation against the inhabitants of Judah and Jerusalem.
results.textEnhanced: And in the reign of Ahasuerus, in the beginning of his reign, they wrote an accusation against the inhabitants of Judah and Jerusalem.

results.text: The LORD possessed me in the beginning of his way, before his works of old.
results.textEnhanced: The LORD possessed me in the beginning of his way, before his works of old.

results.text: An inheritance gained hastily in the beginning will not be blessed in the end.
results.textEnhanced: An inheritance gained hastily in the beginning will not be blessed in the end.

results.text: In the beginning of the reign of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah king of Judah came this word from the LORD, saying,
results.textEnhanced: In the beginning of the reign of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah king of Judah came this word from the LORD, saying,

results.text: In the beginning of the reign of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah, king of Judah, this word came from the LORD:
results.textEnhanced: In the beginning of the reign of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah, king of Judah, this word came from the LORD:

results.text: In the beginning of the reign of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah king of Judah came this word unto Jeremiah from the LORD, saying,
results.textEnhanced: In the beginning of the reign of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah king of Judah came this word unto Jeremiah from the LORD, saying,

results.text: In the beginning of the reign of Zedekiah the son of Josiah, king of Judah, this word came to Jeremiah from the LORD.
results.textEnhanced: In the beginning of the reign of Zedekiah the son of Josiah, king of Judah, this word came to Jeremiah from the LORD.

results.text: And it came to pass the same year, in the beginning of the reign of Zedekiah king of Judah, in the fourth year, and in the fifth month, that Hananiah the son of Azur the prophet, which was of Gibeon, spake unto me in the house of the LORD, in the presence of the priests and of all the people, saying,
results.textEnhanced: And it came to pass the same year, in the beginning of the reign of Zedekiah king of Judah, in the fourth year, and in the fifth month, that Hananiah the son of Azur the prophet, which was of Gibeon, spake unto me in the house of the LORD, in the presence of the priests and of all the people, saying,

results.text: The word of the LORD that came to Jeremiah the prophet against Elam in the beginning of the reign of Zedekiah king of Judah, saying,
results.textEnhanced: The word of the LORD that came to Jeremiah the prophet against Elam in the beginning of the reign of Zedekiah king of Judah, saying,

results.text: The word of the LORD that came to Jeremiah the prophet concerning Elam, in the beginning of the reign of Zedekiah king of Judah.
results.textEnhanced: The word of the LORD that came to Jeremiah the prophet concerning Elam, in the beginning of the reign of Zedekiah king of Judah.

results.text: Arise, cry out in the night: in the beginning of the watches pour out thine heart like water before the face of the LORD: lift up thy hands toward him for the life of thy young children, that faint for hunger in the top of every street.
results.textEnhanced: Arise, cry out in the night: in the beginning of the watches pour out thine heart like water before the face of the LORD: lift up thy hands toward him for the life of thy young children, that faint for hunger in the top of every street.

results.text: In the five and twentieth year of our captivity, in the beginning of the year, in the tenth day of the month, in the fourteenth year after that the city was smitten, in the selfsame day the hand of the LORD was upon me, and brought me thither.
results.textEnhanced: In the five and twentieth year of our captivity, in the beginning of the year, in the tenth day of the month, in the fourteenth year after that the city was smitten, in the selfsame day the hand of the LORD was upon me, and brought me thither.

results.text: Thus hath the Lord GOD shewed unto me; and, behold, he formed grasshoppers in the beginning of the shooting up of the latter growth; and, lo, it was the latter growth after the king's mowings.
results.textEnhanced: Thus hath the Lord GOD shewed unto me; and, behold, he formed grasshoppers in the beginning of the shooting up of the latter growth; and, lo, it was the latter growth after the king's mowings.

results.text: In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.
results.textEnhanced: In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.

results.text: In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.
results.textEnhanced: In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.

results.text: The same was in the beginning with God.
results.textEnhanced: The same was in the beginning with God.

results.text: He was in the beginning with God.
results.textEnhanced: He was in the beginning with God.

results.text: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.
results.textEnhanced: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.

results.text: “For God so loved the world, that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.
results.textEnhanced: “For God so loved the world, that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.

results.text: Husbands, love your wives, even as Christ also loved the church, and gave himself for it;
results.textEnhanced: Husbands, love your wives, even as Christ also loved the church, and gave himself for it;

results.text: Now ye Philippians know also, that in the beginning of the gospel, when I departed from Macedonia, no church communicated with me as concerning giving and receiving, but ye only.
results.textEnhanced: Now ye Philippians know also, that in the beginning of the gospel, when I departed from Macedonia, no church communicated with me as concerning giving and receiving, but ye only.

results.text: And you Philippians yourselves know that in the beginning of the gospel, when I left Macedonia, no church entered into partnership with me in giving and receiving, except you only.
results.textEnhanced: And you Philippians yourselves know that in the beginning of the gospel, when I left Macedonia, no church entered into partnership with me in giving and receiving, except you only.

results.text: And, Thou, Lord, in the beginning hast laid the foundation of the earth; and the heavens are the works of thine hands:
results.textEnhanced: And, Thou, Lord, in the beginning hast laid the foundation of the earth; and the heavens are the works of thine hands:

results.text: And, “You, Lord, laid the foundation of the earth in the beginning, and the heavens are the work of your hands;
results.textEnhanced: And, “You, Lord, laid the foundation of the earth in the beginning, and the heavens are the work of your hands;

results.text: Beloved, if God so loved us, we ought also to love one another.
results.textEnhanced: Beloved, if God so loved us, we ought also to love one another.

results.text: Beloved, if God so loved us, we also ought to love one another.
results.textEnhanced: Beloved, if God so loved us, we also ought to love one another.
